Description: As a new visitor, I want to register an account with my email and password, so that I can access the platform features.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am on the registration page WHEN I enter valid email, password, and name AND I click 'Sign Up' THEN my account is created AND I receive a verification email

Description: As a registered user, I want to login with my email and password, so that I can access my account.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am on the login page WHEN I enter valid email and password AND I click 'Login' THEN I am logged in AND I receive a JWT token

Description: As a user who forgot my password, I want to reset it via email, so that I can regain access to my account.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am on the forgot password page WHEN I enter my registered email THEN I receive a password reset email AND the link expires in 1 hour

Description: As a new user, I want to verify my email address, so that my account is confirmed and secure.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I receive a verification email WHEN I click the verification link THEN my account is verified AND I can login

Description: As a user, I want my session to be managed securely with refresh tokens, so that I stay logged in without security risks.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am logged in WHEN my access token expires THEN the system automatically refreshes my token AND I remain logged in

Description: As a user, I want to login with Google or GitHub, so that I can quickly access the platform.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am on the login page WHEN I click 'Sign in with Google' THEN I am redirected to Google OAuth AND my account is created/linked

Description: As a user, I want to view my profile page, so that I can see my information as others see it.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am logged in WHEN I click 'My Profile' THEN I see my profile with avatar, name, bio, skills, and contact info

Description: As a user, I want to edit my profile information, so that I can keep my details up to date.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am on my profile WHEN I click 'Edit Profile' AND update my info THEN changes are saved AND I see success message

Description: As a user, I want to upload a profile picture, so that my profile looks more personal and professional.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am editing my profile WHEN I upload a valid image (JPG/PNG/WebP under 10MB) THEN my avatar is updated

Description: As a freelancer, I want to add and manage my skills, so that clients can find me based on my expertise.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am on my profile WHEN I add a skill from autocomplete THEN the skill is added (max 10 skills)

Description: As a freelancer, I want to showcase my portfolio projects, so that clients can see my work quality.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am on my profile WHEN I add a portfolio item with title, description, images THEN it appears on my profile

Description: As a user, I want to control who can see my profile information, so that I can protect my privacy.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am in settings WHEN I set profile to 'private' THEN only logged-in users can see my profile

Description: As a user, I want to control my notification preferences, so that I only receive relevant notifications.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am in notification settings WHEN I toggle email notifications off THEN I stop receiving emails for that category

Description: As a user, I want to manage my privacy settings, so that I control what information is visible to others.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am in privacy settings WHEN I hide my email THEN other users cannot see my email address

Description: As a user, I want to set my preferred language and locale, so that the interface is displayed in my language.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am in settings WHEN I select 'Urdu' THEN the interface displays in Urdu language

Description: As a user, I want to connect/disconnect social accounts, so that I can manage my login options.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am in connected accounts WHEN I click 'Connect Google' THEN my Google account is linked

Description: As a user, I want to export my account data, so that I have a copy of my information.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am in settings WHEN I click 'Export Data' THEN I receive a downloadable ZIP with my data

Description: As a user, I want to permanently delete my account, so that my data is removed from the platform.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am in account settings WHEN I confirm deletion with password THEN my account and data are permanently removed

Description: As a security-conscious user, I want to enable 2FA on my account, so that my account is more secure.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I enable 2FA WHEN I scan QR code and enter code THEN 2FA is active AND I receive backup codes

Description: As a user, I want to change my password, so that I can maintain account security.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I know my current password WHEN I enter new password AND confirm THEN password is updated

Description: As a user, I want to see and manage my active login sessions, so that I can secure my account.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am in security settings WHEN I view active sessions THEN I see all logged-in devices AND can log out remotely

Description: As a user, I want to view my login history, so that I can detect suspicious activity.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I am in security settings WHEN I view login history THEN I see date, IP, browser for each login

Description: As a user, I want to receive alerts for suspicious activity, so that I can protect my account.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN there is a new login from unknown location WHEN it occurs THEN I receive email and in-app alert

Description: As a user, I want to switch between dark and light themes, so that I can use the interface comfortably.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I toggle theme switch WHEN I select dark mode THEN all pages display in dark theme AND preference is saved

Description: As a mobile user, I want the interface to work on all screen sizes, so that I can use the platform anywhere.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I use mobile device WHEN I view profile page THEN content is properly formatted for screen size

Description: As a user with accessibility needs, I want the platform to be accessible, so that I can use all features.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I use screen reader WHEN I navigate profile page THEN all elements are properly labeled

Description: As a user, I want to see loading states, so that I know the system is processing my request.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I submit a form WHEN waiting for response THEN I see loading spinner AND buttons are disabled

Description: As a user, I want clear validation feedback, so that I can correct form errors easily.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN I enter invalid data WHEN I leave field THEN I see inline error message immediately

Description: As a developer, I want unit tests for all profile functions, so that code quality is ensured.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN code is written WHEN unit tests run THEN coverage is above 80% AND all tests pass

Description: As a QA engineer, I want integration tests, so that components work together correctly.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN API endpoints exist WHEN integration tests run THEN all endpoints return expected responses

Description: As a QA engineer, I want E2E tests for user flows, so that user journeys work completely.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN test scripts exist WHEN E2E tests run THEN registration, login, profile edit flows complete successfully

Description: As a security engineer, I want security tests, so that vulnerabilities are identified.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN security tests exist WHEN they run THEN SQL injection, XSS, CSRF attacks are blocked

Description: As a developer, I want performance tests, so that the system meets speed requirements.
Acceptance Criteria: GIVEN load tests exist WHEN run with 1000 concurrent users THEN response time is under 2 seconds
